DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion - Age ≥18 year - expect ICU stay ≥48 hour - vitamin D deficiency : 25 ( OH ) D ≤ 20 ng/ml - feasibility study drug application via nasogastric tube case oral food intake possible Exclusion criterion - moribund patient expect die within 24 hour - hypercalcaemia ( total calcium > 2.65 OR ion . calcium > 1.35 mmol/l ) - severely impaired gastrointestinal motility ( ileus , residual gastric volume > 400 ml ) - know history recent kidney stone ( ≤ 1 year ) - know granulomatous disease ( tuberculosis , sarcoidosis ) - pregnancy Primary endpoint - hospital stay ( hour ; start ICU admission ) Secondary endpoint - percentage patient 25 ( OH ) D ≥ 30 ng/ml day 7 - serum calcium ; phosphorus ; 25 ( OH ) D ; 1,25 ( OH ) D ; PTH ; osteocalcin ; bALP ; TRAP ; urinary calcium
